item.description:
This is a great place to have fun and meet some wonderful women. We have a great crowd that just love to dance and get together.

Latin Dance Lessons: 8:00 pm - 9:00 pm

Don't be shy, take this opportunity to impress your friends and also make new friends at Maddy’s Lounge, don't sit around anymore- make it happen.


Come dance all night long to the beat of International music from every country. You won’t want to sit down, once you learned how to Salsa, Merenge and Samba.

Please make sure you are on time, as classes begin right at 8:00 PM. Classes are $10.00 per person (includes cover charge). Than just dance the night away to the sounds of D.J. Placido.

• Free Parking
• 21+, proper ID is required
• $7.00 Cover Charge
• Plenty of seating
• HUGE dance floor
• Good Food
• Fully stocked Bar
• KENO
• Pleasant lounge area (separate room)
item.name: LATIN NIGHT
